con:request.name: Request 1
con:request.con:request:
{ "prodSpec":[ { "name":"BNA6", "line":"BNR", "component":[ { "name":"BNR Firmware", "description":"BNR Firmwares v1.13.1", "type":"Firmware", "min":1, "max":1, "componentIdFormat":"", "versionFormat":"", "removeAllowed":false, "addRule":"", "upgradeRule":"", "downgradeRule":"", "version":[ { "name":"v2.0.0", "description":"BNR Firmware v2.0.0 
 Hardware compatibility 
• Due to introduction of new CPU and Sensor PCBA’s. 
• Adaptation to electro-mechanical change to drive new sensors and solenoid. 
Product Enhancement 
• Banknotes storage increase in memory from 60 to 150 notes 
• Capability for BNR Main Module to communicate to host its own internal temperature. 
• Firmware sequence changes to reduce jam risks. 
• Firmware changes to facilitate repair operations. 
• Increase bill transport error report size to facilitate BNR diagnostics. 
• Improved Firmware and Bill set Security by adding cryptographic digital signature. (Not included in RC version) 
Bug Fixes 
• XChannel signal low for short time.", "componentId":"98600 6 000", "releaseDate":"2018-09-04T13:23:29.240Z", "fileId":"98600 6 000 - BNR Firmwares-2.0.0.zip", "isNew":false }, { "name":"v1.13.1", con:restRequest.name: Create on Prod
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "prodSpec":[ { "name":"BNA6", "line":"BNR", "component":[ { "name":"BNR Firmware", "description":"BNR Firmwares v1.13.1", "type":"Firmware", "min":1, "max":1, "componentIdFormat":"", "versionFormat":"", "removeAllowed":false, "addRule":"", "upgradeRule":"", "downgradeRule":"", "version":[ { "name":"v2.0.0", "description":"BNR Firmware v2.0.0 
 Hardware compatibility 
• Due to introduction of new CPU and Sensor PCBA’s. 
• Adaptation to electro-mechanical change to drive new sensors and solenoid. 
Product Enhancement 
• Banknotes storage increase in memory from 60 to 150 notes 
• Capability for BNR Main Module to communicate to host its own internal temperature. 
• Firmware sequence changes to reduce jam risks. 
• Firmware changes to facilitate repair operations. 
• Increase bill transport error report size to facilitate BNR diagnostics. 
• Improved Firmware and Bill set Security by adding cryptographic digital signature. (Not included in RC version) 
Bug Fixes 
• XChannel signal low for short time.", "componentId":"98600 6 000", "releaseDate":"2018-09-04T13:23:29.240Z", "fileId":"98600 6 000 - BNR Firmwares-2.0.0.zip", "isNew":false }, { "name":"v1.13.1",
